data.title: Pediatric Ophthalmology, Strabismus
data.meta_description: Find information about and book an appointment with Dr. Michelle Falcone, MD in Naples, FL, Palm Beach Gardens, FL. Specialties: Pediatric Ophthalmology, Strabismus.

Star

5 out of 5 stars5 of 5 stars

Reviewed on 6/19/2024

Dr.Falcone, was born to be in this field. Very intelligent, very compassionate. She really cares for the kids. She spent hours with me for a visit that was only supposed to take 30 minutes due to my son being autistic.

Star

5 out of 5 stars5 of 5 stars

Reviewed on 11/22/2023

Dr. Falcone shared her phone number, and was accessible so readily. She called me daily, when I was experiencing pain. She even called me at 9pm! Never have I had this level of patient care.

Reviewed on 9/16/2023

Dr Falcone is one of the best I've encountered ever. She's excellent! I wish she could be my doctor for everything!

Star

Star

Star

Star

Star

5 out of 5 stars5 of 5 stars

Reviewed on 6/3/2023

Dr. Falcone was extremely thorough, patient, and knowledgeable. She explained in detail her assessment and plan, and engaged all of our questions. She has a natural way of working with children. She really set our minds at ease, not because everything was perfectly fine, but because she had a plan for any issue and confidently shared that plan with us. We are thankful to have found such a compassionate and skilled provider for our son.

Reviewed on 1/16/2023

Dr. Falcone spent a long time with my issue. I was relieved that she was a thorough as she was to find a solution to the extent of bringing the optician to the consultation room!
